pages.text: Rolling is hard to master but if done right can be an incredibly effective tool in your adventure.

pages.title: How to roll
pages.text: By default rolling is bound to the $(thing)R$() key and can be changed in controls. When pressed it will allow you to roll in the direction you are walking.

pages.title: Enchantments
pages.text: $(thing)Longfooted$() can be enchanted on boots $(li)Increases the distance of your rolls (by 1 block / level)$()$(br2)$(thing)Acrobat's Shirt$() & $(thing)Acrobat's Pants$() can be enchanted on chests and legs respectively $(li)Increases the recharge speed of the roll cooldown (by +10% / level)$()
$(thing)Multi-Roll$() can be enchanted on helmets $(li)Grants extra rolls (+1 roll / level)
